long_description: The Seirus Combo TNT(TM) headliner features a thin Thermax(R) wicking hood that combines with a fleece neck warmer and neoprene face mask to keep your face warm on the coldest days. Neofleece(R) mouth section consists of a neoprene exterior that is lined with warm fleece; perforations allow you to breathe easily and expel moisture. Thick fleece neck warmer is comfortable next to skin. 4-way stretch top fits comfortably and moves with you. Can be worn as a helmet liner, balaclava, face mask or neck warmer.
short_description: The Seirus Combo TNT(TM) headliner features a thin Thermax(R) wicking hood that combines with a fleece neck warmer and neoprene face mask to keep your face warm on the coldest days.
